otp.subject: Your OTP Code
otp.body: Your OTP code is: {otp}. Please use this code within 20 minutes.

invite-user.subject: You're Invited to Senior Experts Network
invite-user.body: You have been invited to join the Senior Experts Network. Click the button below to get started.

new-application.subject: New Application Received
new-application.body: Hello {user_name}, {applicant_name} has applied for your project: {project_name}.

application-shortlisted.subject: Your Application Has Been Shortlisted
application-shortlisted.body: Congratulations {user_name}! Your application for {project_name} has been shortlisted.

application-accepted.subject: Your Application Has Been Accepted
application-accepted.body: Great news {user_name}! Your application for {project_name} has been accepted.

application-rejected.subject: Application Update
application-rejected.body: Thank you for your interest {user_name}. Unfortunately, your application for {project_name} was not selected this time.

project-closed.subject: Project Closed
project-closed.body: Hello {user_name}, the project {project_name} has been closed.

project_application_closed.subject: Project Applications Closed
project_application_closed.body: Hello {user_name}, applications for the project {project_name} are now closed.

project-draft.subject: Project Draft Created
project-draft.body: Hello {user_name}, a draft for the project {project_name} has been created.

project-published.subject: Project Published
project-published.body: Hello {user_name}, the project {project_name} has been published.

new-connection.subject: New Connection Request
new-connection.body: Hello {user_name}, {sender_name} wants to connect with you.

connection-accepted.subject: Connection Request Accepted
connection-accepted.body: Hello {user_name}, {receiver_name} has accepted your connection request.

connection-rejected.subject: Connection Request Declined
connection-rejected.body: Hello {user_name}, {receiver_name} has declined your connection request.

payment-success.subject: Payment Successful
payment-success.body: Hello {user_name}, your payment of ${amount} has been processed successfully.

payment-failed.subject: Payment Failed
payment-failed.body: Hello {user_name}, your payment of ${amount} could not be processed. Please try again.
